observation.output:
=== Testing Edge Cases ===

Edge case 1: Single required column ['time'], time removed
  ✓ ValueError: TimeSeries object is invalid - expected 'time' as the first column but time series has no columns
  ✓ Empty table error preserved

Edge case 2: Single required column ['time'], but 'flux' present
  ✓ ValueError: TimeSeries object is invalid - required column 'time' is missing
  ✓ Missing single column error works

Edge case 3: Required ['time', 'flux'], but ['time', 'flux', 'extra'] present
  ✓ No exception raised (correct - extra columns allowed)

Edge case 4: Required ['time', 'flux', 'error'], but ['time', 'flux', 'extra'] present
  ✓ ValueError: TimeSeries object is invalid - required column 'error' is missing
  ✓ Correctly identifies missing column despite extra columns

Edge case 5: Required ['time', 'flux'], but ['flux', 'time'] present
  ✓ ValueError: TimeSeries object is invalid - expected 'time' as the first columns but found 'flux'
  ✓ Ordering error preserved

Edge case 6: Required columns checking disabled
  ✓ No exception raised (correct - checking disabled)

Edge case 7: No required columns specified
  ✓ No exception raised (correct - no requirements)

Edge case 8: Empty required columns list
  ✓ No exception raised (correct - no requirements)

Edge case 9: Required columns relax mode
  ✓ No exception raised (correct - relax mode allows partial match)

=== Edge Case Testing Complete ===
✓ All edge cases handled correctly
✓ Fix is robust and maintains backward compatibility
